channel.title: national park on Huy Le
channel.description: Recent content in national park on Huy Le

item.title: The Maroon Bells
item.description: Trip to Montana? Nawh! I’ll do you one better! The Colorado Maroon Bells! Sit down. Take a deep breath. I’ll tell a story…

item.title: Zion - Conquered
item.description: Arrived at the trailhead, we eagerly jumped out of the shuttle to start our adventure. Meanwhile we were doing our last gear check, a couple next to us (the only other people that rode with us to the trailhead on the shuttle) started talking and got into a small conversation. The only memorable thing about our little chat was when the gal said “… we don’t plan for our trips, that way, we would never be disappointed.”

item.title: Zion National Park
item.description: A week well before spring break, we had our gears ready and food prepared. On the Saturday before spring break starts, the four of us took off to Zion National Park.

item.title: Adventure - Defined
item.description: With that definition out of the way. Let’s talk about our adventure to the Great Sand Dunes eh?

item.title: We Came. We Saw. We Conquered.
item.description: Lets pick up where we left off eh? Moab. The one place where boys go to become men.. and girls to become boys.

item.title: It's About the Journey, Not the Destination
item.description: Once again… we found the adrenaline rush just sitting around and planning for a backpacking trip. This time, Moab, round two.

item.title: Sit with Me Awhile
item.description: This is a self-picture from a morning hike in The Needles in Canyonlands National Park during sunrise.

item.title: Moab, Utah
item.description: We spend months before that Monday of Memorial Day, thinking about the trip, gathering up the gears and getting people to be on the same boat. It was determined that no matter what happened, the trip will be started and finished that week.
